scenes.description: Final performance of the song 'Missing Promise' featuring a dramatic battle choreography.
Transition to the Underworld where Mori Calliope, the Lord of Death, is visited by the spirit of Takanashi Kiara.
Kiara warns Calliope about the return of the Demon of Sound and pleads for intervention.
Calliope decides to ascend to the world of the living to stop the demon.
In a ruined garden, Calliope confronts the Demon of Sound, Nerissa Ravencroft.

subtitles.original: 笑い合った日々を
subtitles.english: The days we laughed together

subtitles.original: 何度間違い続けた日々を
subtitles.english: The days we kept making mistakes

subtitles.original: 解いて結び直すように
subtitles.english: As if to untie and retie them

subtitles.original: 迷っても会いに行くよ
subtitles.english: Even if I lose my way, I'll go to meet you

subtitles.original: 悲しい涙は拭って
subtitles.english: Wipe away the sad tears

subtitles.original: いつの間にか忘れていた
subtitles.english: I had forgotten before I knew it

subtitles.original: その優しい声を探して
subtitles.english: Looking for that gentle voice

subtitles.original: ただ手を取り合えたなら
subtitles.english: If only we could just hold hands

subtitles.original: 君ともう一度約束を交わそう
subtitles.english: Let's make a promise with you once more

subtitles.original: Kiara.
subtitles.english: Kiara.

subtitles.original: Dead.
subtitles.english: Dead.

subtitles.original: Huh, never thought I'd see the day.
subtitles.english: Huh, never thought I'd see the day.

subtitles.original: But tell me, what laid you low?
subtitles.english: But tell me, what laid you low?

subtitles.original: I must know, as there are few that could bring this about.
subtitles.english: I must know, as there are few that could bring this about.

subtitles.original: And even fewer who would give you reason to voyage on through my blackened halls
subtitles.english: And even fewer who would give you reason to voyage on through my blackened halls

subtitles.original: and not return to the world of the living as a hatchling.
subtitles.english: and not return to the world of the living as a hatchling.

subtitles.original: Must be urgent, whatever it is.
subtitles.english: Must be urgent, whatever it is.

subtitles.original: Forgive me, but...
subtitles.english: Forgive me, but...

subtitles.original: ...I felt this was something you needed to hear urgently.
subtitles.english: ...I felt this was something you needed to hear urgently.

subtitles.original: I was slain by one with whom you are quite familiar.
subtitles.english: I was slain by one with whom you are quite familiar.

subtitles.original: A tyrant of darkness.
subtitles.english: A tyrant of darkness.

subtitles.original: One out to bring all the world under her domain.
subtitles.english: One out to bring all the world under her domain.

subtitles.original: To worship her for all eternity.
subtitles.english: To worship her for all eternity.

subtitles.original: It can't be.
subtitles.english: It can't be.

subtitles.original: I'm afraid the Demon of Sound has been freed from the void again
subtitles.english: I'm afraid the Demon of Sound has been freed from the void again

subtitles.original: and is in the world once more.
subtitles.english: and is in the world once more.

subtitles.original: Her long confinement has ended, and she is the same as she has ever been.
subtitles.english: Her long confinement has ended, and she is the same as she has ever been.

subtitles.original: Quick to anger, blinded by her lust for adoration.
subtitles.english: Quick to anger, blinded by her lust for adoration.

subtitles.original: And this time, I was the second victim of her lust for love and blood.
subtitles.english: And this time, I was the second victim of her lust for love and blood.

subtitles.original: You? Murdered by that love-obsessed demon?
subtitles.english: You? Murdered by that love-obsessed demon?

subtitles.original: Yes.
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: And her first victim was a good friend of mine, too.
subtitles.english: And her first victim was a good friend of mine, too.

subtitles.original: Forgive me, Lord Death, but this injustice cannot stand.
subtitles.english: Forgive me, Lord Death, but this injustice cannot stand.

subtitles.original: Unfortunately, her power is already beyond my ability to stop.
subtitles.english: Unfortunately, her power is already beyond my ability to stop.

subtitles.original: Please, you must do something to stop that demon.
subtitles.english: Please, you must do something to stop that demon.

subtitles.original: That monster.
subtitles.english: That monster.

subtitles.original: She will surely only take more lives...
subtitles.english: She will surely only take more lives...

subtitles.original: ...and plunge the world into further chaos.
subtitles.english: ...and plunge the world into further chaos.

subtitles.original: Come on, quick!
subtitles.english: Come on, quick!

subtitles.original: Ascend to the world of the living with your great scythe in hand...
subtitles.english: Ascend to the world of the living with your great scythe in hand...

subtitles.original: ...and reap the life of the Demon of Sound before she can claim another victim.
subtitles.english: ...and reap the life of the Demon of Sound before she can claim another victim.

subtitles.original: Avenge my life and the life of my friend, I beg you.
subtitles.english: Avenge my life and the life of my friend, I beg you.

subtitles.original: That demon cannot be left to ravage the world once more.
subtitles.english: That demon cannot be left to ravage the world once more.

subtitles.original: I warned the other gods before, but here we are.
subtitles.english: I warned the other gods before, but here we are.

subtitles.original: It is time I take this into my own hand and do what I should have done long ago.
subtitles.english: It is time I take this into my own hand and do what I should have done long ago.

subtitles.original: Hmph. Your demonic side was always to be the death of you, IRyS.
subtitles.english: Hmph. Your demonic side was always to be the death of you, IRyS.

subtitles.original: Don't you dare speak her name!
subtitles.english: Don't you dare speak her name!

subtitles.original: Silence!
subtitles.english: Silence!

subtitles.original: Your bloodlust and desire for adoration has clouded your judgment...
subtitles.english: Your bloodlust and desire for adoration has clouded your judgment...

subtitles.original: ...to the point where you can't even tell friend from foe anymore.
subtitles.english: ...to the point where you can't even tell friend from foe anymore.

subtitles.original: You're the one who brought bloody doom upon your own beloved friend.
subtitles.english: You're the one who brought bloody doom upon your own beloved friend.

subtitles.original: And yourself.
subtitles.english: And yourself.

subtitles.original: Your fear of losing your hold over things brings about the very result you so fear.
subtitles.english: Your fear of losing your hold over things brings about the very result you so fear.

subtitles.original: How dare you!
subtitles.english: How dare you!

subtitles.original: Continue on with your excuses, blame who you will for your own misdoing if you wish.
subtitles.english: Continue on with your excuses, blame who you will for your own misdoing if you wish.

subtitles.original: In the end, you have only yourself to blame for the situation you find yourself in.
subtitles.english: In the end, you have only yourself to blame for the situation you find yourself in.

subtitles.original: A lust for love so strong that those you loved turn away.
subtitles.english: A lust for love so strong that those you loved turn away.

subtitles.original: A desire for power so overwhelming...
subtitles.english: A desire for power so overwhelming...

subtitles.original: ...those you have power over turn on you.
subtitles.english: ...those you have power over turn on you.

subtitles.original: An anger so deep that you destroy all who might have helped save you.
subtitles.english: An anger so deep that you destroy all who might have helped save you.

subtitles.original: Your fate has been sealed by your own hand.
subtitles.english: Your fate has been sealed by your own hand.

subtitles.original: And now, I am now here to deliver it to you.
subtitles.english: And now, I am now here to deliver it to you.

subtitles.original: Why do you get to decide who lives or dies?
subtitles.english: Why do you get to decide who lives or dies?

subtitles.original: You, who sits alone in your own realm.
subtitles.english: You, who sits alone in your own realm.

subtitles.original: Empress of all, both life and death at your fingertips.
subtitles.english: Empress of all, both life and death at your fingertips.

subtitles.original: Why?
subtitles.english: Why?
